title: enakkum aruLinIrO en svAmi
sahitya:
enakkum aruLinIrO en svAmi ninaikka ninaikka endan nenjamellAm inikka


anupallavi

  vanattil vandanru oru kaNattil ennai mayakki en manattilE enrenrum nilaittu viTTa kaNNA 
vazhi terindadO manam tuNindadO aruL pirandadO uLam tirandadO


caraNam    kaNgaL iraNDum ummaik-kANat-tuDittadE anda kAlamellAm ninaittu manam shOkam paDittadE 
paNNum pazhamum annam pAlum veruttadE paghalum iravum mAri pala yugamAi kazhittadE
				(madhyama kAlam)
pada malariNait-tALuvIrenru (en) paramanE en iraivanE ena analiDaippaTTa mezhugidu 
pOlavum ADiyum alariyum pADiyum paraviyum aDi paNinda tuNmaiyallavO innum 
shollavO ezhilamudak-kuzhaleDuttu varuvAi ishai paDittu varuvAi aruL taruvAi
